item.title: Taiwan to invest $250B in US semiconductor manufacturing
item.description: The U.S. struck a trade deal with Taiwan as the country looks to help boost domestic semiconductor manufacturing.

item.title: AI video startup, Higgsfield, founded by ex-Snap exec, lands $1.3B valuation
item.description: Higgsfield says it's on a $200 million annual revenue run rate. So it opened its previous Series A round back up and sold another $80 million in share...

item.title: Iran’s internet shutdown is now one of its longest ever, as protests continue
item.description: Iran’s government-imposed internet shutdown enters its second week as authorities continue their violent crackdown on protesters.

item.title: The US imposes 25% tariff on Nvidia’s H200 AI chips headed to China
item.description: The Trump administration formalized its 25% cut of H200 chip sales in China with a tariff that applies to certain semiconductors.

item.title: OpenAI invests in Sam Altman’s brain computer interface startup Merge Labs
item.description: Merge Labs is a “research lab” dedicated to “bridging biological and artificial intelligence to maximize human ability.” OpenAI wrote the largest chec...
